title: Step 1
description: Choose the products you would like to certify. We can advise on our testing availability and help you prioritize your device list.

title: Step 2
description: Sign our WWHA agreement. This lays out clearly each partyâ€™s responsibilities to each other.

title: Step 3
description: Pay the annual fee payment of 500 Swiss Francs*. Designed to cover admin only, so that the program can still be a great fit for start-up companies.

title: Step 4
description: Devices are tested by our expert team. Tell us about any custom clusters or quirks so our team can understand how your items work with the specifications.

title: Step 5
description: Testing feedback is given. Not simply a pass/fail: Feedback rounds are imperative to help us address issues and keep user experience top priority.
